name: lucid-md
description: Javascript WhatsApp bot made by starboy

WELCOME_IMG.description: Default image used for welcome messages.

WELCOME_MSG.description: Default welcome message template. Use {user}, {group}, {count}, {desc} in the text.
WELCOME_MSG.value:

Please read the rules and enjoy your stay.

GOODBYE_IMG.description: Default image used for goodbye messages.

GOODBYE_MSG.description: Default goodbye message template. Use {user}, {group}, {count}, {desc} in the text.
GOODBYE_MSG.value: ðŸ˜¢ Goodbye @user. We will miss you!

DEFAULT_AUTOTYPING_ON_DEPLOY.description: Enable auto-typing presence for groups on deploy (true/false).

DEFAULT_AUTORECORD_ON_DEPLOY.description: Enable auto-recording presence for groups on deploy (true/false).

DEFAULT_WELCOME_ON_DEPLOY.description: Enable welcome messages by default on deploy (true/false).

DEFAULT_GOODBYE_ON_DEPLOY.description: Enable goodbye messages by default on deploy (true/false).
